view

Class View

  • Object
    • View
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleView

    public abstract class View
extends Object
    View is an abstract base class of all View instances.
    Author:
    YingHao

      • display

      • input

        public abstract void input(Map<String,String> input)
        Request user to input data for the keys present in this map. Use a LinkedHashMap or any map implementation that preserves order if order of requesting input is relevant.
        Parameters:
        input - - The map to be populated with user input after this method returns.

      • error

        public abstract void error(List<String> invalidFields)
        Warns user of the invalid fields.
        Parameters:
        invalidFields - - A list of invalid fields that requires user's attention.

      • display

        public abstract void display(Object object)
        Displays the specified entity.
        Parameters:
        object - - The object to be displayed.

      • display

        public abstract void display(List objList)
        Displays a list of entity.
        Parameters:
        objList - - The list of objects to be displayed.

      • message

        public abstract void message(String message)
        Display a message.
        Parameters:
        message - - The message to be displayed

      • bailout

        public abstract boolean bailout()
        Constructs a user bailout message and returns user's choice.
        Returns:
        A flag indicating if user wants to bailout.

      • options

        public abstract <T> T options(List<T> options)
        Displays a list of options for the user to select.
        Parameters:
        options - - The list of options.
        Returns:
        Selected option.

      • getTitle

        public String getTitle()
        Gets the title of the view.
        Returns:
        A string title for the view.
